name: Trivia Vault: Golf Trivia
description: Welcome to the Trivia Vault contestant! Play as a contestant in a gameshow called Trivia Vault Golf Trivia and bring your thinking hat. Answer golf trivia questions as quickly as you can, the faster you answer the higher the cash...
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 32-bit or higher Processor: 2.0 ghz or higher Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: 500 Megs VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
